product_name: Kurgo Quick Release Tru-Fit Smart Harness - Small - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Like kids, dogs can be a little rambunctious when riding in cars. This 5-way adjustable harness secures to a seat belt, alleviating the distractions a dog can cause in a vehicle.
short_description: Like kids, dogs can be a little rambunctious when riding in cars. This 5-way adjustable harness secures to a seat belt, alleviating the distractions a dog can cause in a vehicle.
